meta.name: activity
meta.description: Starts a new Discord activity in a voice channel.

options.channel: The voice channel to start the activity in.

errors.noChannel: You need to be in a voice channel, or to choose a voice channel using the `channel` option.
errors.notVoice: You need to choose a voice channel in order to start an activity!

strings.description: Click the button below to join your activity in
